description: Request parameters for discovering available advertising products

account_id.description: Account ID for product lookup. Required when the seller declares account.required_for_products = true in capabilities. Returns products with pricing specific to this account's rate card.

brand.description: Brand reference for product discovery context. Resolved to full brand identity at execution time.

brief.description: Natural language description of campaign requirements.

product_selectors.description: Selectors to filter the brand's product catalog for product discovery. When provided, sellers should only return advertising products where the selected catalog items have matches. Uses the same selection methods as promoted-offerings.

property_list.description: [AdCP 3.0] Reference to an externally managed property list. When provided, the sales agent should filter products to only those available on properties in the list.

title: Get Products Request
